document_data.title: Bad Business in Parnast
document_data.design: [[Joe Marflak]]{{Cite adventurers league/Bad Business in Parnast|1}}
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Bad Business in Parnast''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Storm King's Thunder|Storm King's Thunder]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Parnast]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 1{{st}}- to 4{{th}}-level characters.

{{Quote|''Bad Fruul and his minions have been threatening to overtake the town of Parnast for some time, and intelligence provided by SEER (via Hsing) confirms that an attack is imminent. Despite this, the town is at risk from within as internal politics threaten to tear it apart. It is up to the adventurers to resolve the infighting in Parnast and prepare the town for the hill giant's onslaught.''|}}
